title: Love & Folk Music
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, Dustin walks us through the Amanda Knox true crime story in Italy.

Black Business of the Week - Hey Fran Hey & Maryam Hasnaa’s Embodiment Collection is back on 11/11 - https://www.etsy.com/listing/696314268/embodiment-box-resonance-apothecary-and

THE FRIEND ZONE IS ON PATREON! Sign up now to catch our 4 spin-off shows (with audio, video and BTS images) and Livestream Tour: www.patreon.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Thank you to our Sponsors:
The Friend Zone x Target x AfroPunk - Hey y’all! We’re hosting a special video event sponsored by Target, talking all about the artists and performances from the Uncontained stage at Afropunk Atlanta. Make sure you tune in Thursday, November 11th, to check it out! It’s one day only, so mark your calendar for 11-11 and we’ll see you  then at AfropunkRewind.com.  
Marketplace’s This Is Uncomfortable Podcast - Subscribe to This is Uncomfortable wherever you get your podcasts. New episodes out now.

Honey - If you don’t already have Honey, you could be straight up missing out on free savings. It’s literally FREE and installs in a few seconds. And by getting it, you’ll be doing yourself a solid and supporting this  podcast. Get Honey for FREE at https://www.joinhoney.com/FRIENDZONE

Hello Fresh - Go to https://www.hellofresh.com/friendzone14 and use code friendzone14 for up to 14 free meals AND 3 free gifts! 

ZocDoc - NOW is the time to prioritize your health. Go to https://www.zocdoc.com/FRIENDZONE and download the Zocdoc app to sign-up for FREE and book a top-rated doctor. 

Target - Celebrate your legacy. Invest in the future. Together, we are Black Beyond Measure. Visit https://www.target.com/BLACKBEYONDMEASURE to learn more.
